tool.name: bcftools @EXECUTABLE@
tool.description: HMM model for detecting runs of homo/autozygosity
tool.command:
@PREPARE_ENV@ @PREPARE_INPUT_FILE@ #set $section = $sec_restrict @PREPARE_TARGETS_FILE@ @PREPARE_REGIONS_FILE@ ## General section #set $section = $sec_general @PREPARE_AF_FILE@
bcftools @EXECUTABLE@
## General section #set $section = $sec_general @SAMPLE@ @AF_FILE@ #if $section.AF_tag: --AF-tag "${section.AF_tag}" #end if #if $section.AF_dflt: --AF-dflt "${section.AF_dflt}" #end if @ESTIMATE_AF@ #if $section.GTs_only: --GTs-only "${section.GTs_only}" #end if ${section.skip_indels} #if $section.genetic_map: --genetic-map "${section.genetic_map}" #end if #if $section.rec_rate: --rec-rate "${section.rec_rate}" #end if #if $section.buffer_size: #if $section.buffer_overlap: --buffer-size "${section.buffer_size},${section.buffer_overlap}" #else: --buffer-size "${section.buffer_size}" #end if #end if
## HMM section #set $section = $sec_hmm #if $section.hw_to_az: --hw-to-az "${section.hw_to_az}" #end if #if $section.az_to_hw: --az-to-hw "${section.az_to_hw}" #end if ${section.viterbi_training}
## General section #set $section = $sec_restrict @REGIONS@ @TARGETS@ @SAMPLES@
#if str($output_type) in ('r','s'): --output-type $output_type #end if
## Primary Input/Outputs @INPUT_FILE@ > '$output_file'

param.name: AF_tag
param.label: AF TAG
param.help: Use the specified INFO tag TAG as an allele frequency estimate instead of the defaul AC and AN tags. Sites which do not have TAG will be skipped.

param.name: AF_dflt
param.label: AF Default
param.help: If AF is not known, use this allele frequency

param.name: GTs_only
param.label: Gts Only
param.help: Use GTs, ignore PLs, use <float> for PL of unseen genotypes. Safe value to use is 30 to account for GT errors.

param.name: skip_indels
param.label: Skip Indels
param.help: Skip indels as their genotypes are enriched for errors

param.name: genetic_map
param.label: Genetic Map
param.help: Genetic map in IMPUTE2 format, single file or mask, where string "{CHROM}" is replaced with chromosome name

param.name: buffer_size
param.label: Sliding Buffer Size
param.help: Use when the entire many-sample file cannot fit into memory. The number of sites to keep in memory. If negative, it is interpreted as the maximum memory to use, in MB.

param.name: buffer_overlap
param.label: Sliding Buffer Overlap
param.help: The number of overlapping sites for the sliding buffer. The default overlap is set to roughly 1% of the buffer size.

param.name: hw_to_az
param.label: Hw To Az
param.help: P(AZ|HW) transition probability from HW (Hardy-Weinberg) to AZ (autozygous) state

param.name: az_to_hw
param.label: Az To Hw
param.help: P(HW|AZ) transition probability from AZ to HW state

param.name: viterbi_training
param.label: Viterbi Training
param.help: Perform Viterbi training to estimate transition probabilities
